title: Impeachment, NATO & 2020
itunes:title: Impeachment, NATO & 2020
description:
Kevin spoke with Ron Bonjean, Partner at Rokk Solutions and Patrick Murphy, former Democratic Congressman for Florida's 18th district.

They discussed four constitutional law professors testifying today in the impeachment inquiry against President Trump, comments from the NATO summit in London and the 2020 elections.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
